Learjet slot granting steps:
• SCR message to handler scr@slotcoordination.nl with service type X.
• In case it’s not accepted (tell you they don’t have PPRs) ask handler for exception. You may be instructed to contact airport authorities. (Disclaimer: usually we really need the slots due to AOGs there)
• Ask handler to speak with airport if possible or to provide you or confirm which number you need to call airport authorities at. (previously provided EIN OPS number: +31402919823)
• If an exception is made proceed with PPRs if they are given. If they say that it will be handled as a normal flight. please apply with normal SCR and STC (service type) P.
• Please apply as per normal procedure with CHG request - SCR and STC (service type) P.
• In case you need to reach slot coordination but hey are not answering you can kindly ask for help EIN OPS +31402919823 .

We need PPRs even though the airport is not coordinated. But only for arrivals.
1. Send SLOT REQ as soon as an ad-hoc flight is added via this website PPR | Lithuanian Airports (ltou.lt).
2. You need to submit a few documents but you can ask for a hand Crew control for General declaration (GEN dec) and OPS for Air Operator Certificate No. (sent to all via email).
3. When filling do not put your personal name but Ryanair.
4. Ground Handling we use Litcargus checked with GOPS.
NB! No PPRs for test flights (T).
Aviation Authorities phone number: 0037061012665
Gendec template: https://www.aeroplusaviation.com/wp-content/uploads/General_Declaration_form.doc
Website for PPR: https://www.ltou.lt/en/forms/ppr-kun-eyka
Description of the procedure and NOTAM: https://www.ltou.lt//uploads/documents/files/SAFETY/PPR/LTOU%20PPR%20ED%20No_1_1%20EN_rev%20(1).pdf
